Description.Text: Aviva Holiday Studios are located in Hammer-smith. The extensive transport links make it a convenient base to explore London. Aviva Holiday Studios are only a 3 minute walk from public transport & only minutes away by underground & bus from top London attractions of Kensington, South Kensington, Knights-bridge as well as central London a 15-20 minute ride away. Closer to home HMV Apollo is a 5 minute walk. Aviva Studios provide you with refurbished Studios at budget prices. every studio is designed to give you a comfortable & enjoyable stay providing you with all the amenities required during your stay. They provide a selection of Studios ranging from single Studios to family sizes studios. Fax & photocopying services are provided on request as well as WiFi Internet through out your stay.

Single Studio - Single Studio with one twin bed includes fridge, oven, microwave, kettle/toaster and all modern appliances. All are supplied with tableware & cutlery. Each apartment has a private shower/toilet/washroom, double bed, satellite TV, linen & towels, wifi internet & a maid cleaning service.
Double Studio - Double Studio with one double bed includes fridge, oven, microwave, kettle/toaster and all modern appliances. All are supplied with tableware & cutlery. Each apartment has a private shower/toilet/washroom, double bed, satellite TV, linen & towels, wifi internet & a maid cleaning service.
Triple Studio - Triple Studio with one double and one twin bed includes full kitchen facilities to include: fridge, oven, microwave, kettle/toaster and all modern appliances. All are supplied with tableware & cutlery. Each apartment has a private shower/toilet/washroom, double bed, satellite TV, linen & towels, wifi internet & a maid cleaning service.
